description: This API is in preview release for Amazon Connect and is subject to change. Describes the specified contact.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance. You can find the instance ID in the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the contact.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The identifier for the contact.

nested_items.name: InitialContactId
nested_items.description: If this contact is related to other contacts, this is the ID of the initial contact.

nested_items.name: PreviousContactId
nested_items.description: If this contact is not the first contact, this is the ID of the previous contact.

nested_items.name: ContactAssociationId
nested_items.description: This is the root contactId which is used as a unique identifier for all subsequent contacts in a contact tree.

nested_items.name: InitiationMethod
nested_items.description: Indicates how the contact was initiated.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the contact.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the contact.

nested_items.name: Channel
nested_items.description: How the contact reached your contact center.

nested_items.name: QueueInfo
nested_items.description: If this contact was queued, this contains information about the queue.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the queue.

nested_items.name: EnqueueTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the contact was added to the queue.

nested_items.name: AgentInfo
nested_items.description: Information about the agent who accepted the contact.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the agent who accepted the contact.

nested_items.name: ConnectedToAgentTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the contact was connected to the agent.

nested_items.name: AgentPauseDurationInSeconds
nested_items.description: Agent pause duration for a contact in seconds.

nested_items.name: HierarchyGroups
nested_items.description: The agent hierarchy groups for the agent.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the group.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the group.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the group.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the group.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the group.

nested_items.name: DeviceInfo
nested_items.description: Information regarding Agent's device.

nested_items.name: PlatformName
nested_items.description: Name of the platform that the participant used for the call.

nested_items.name: PlatformVersion
nested_items.description: Version of the platform that the participant used for the call.

nested_items.name: OperatingSystem
nested_items.description: Operating system that the participant used for the call.

nested_items.name: Capabilities
nested_items.description: The configuration for the allowed video and screen sharing capabilities for participants present over the call. For more information, see Set up in-app, web, video calling, and screen sharing capabilities in the Amazon Connect Administrator Guide.

nested_items.name: Video
nested_items.description: The configuration having the video and screen sharing capabilities for participants over the call.

nested_items.name: ScreenShare
nested_items.description: The screen sharing capability that is enabled for the participant. SEND indicates the participant can share their screen.

nested_items.name: AfterContactWorkDuration
nested_items.description: The difference in time, in whole seconds, between AfterContactWorkStartTimestamp and AfterContactWorkEndTimestamp.

nested_items.name: AfterContactWorkStartTimestamp
nested_items.description: The date and time when the agent started doing After Contact Work for the contact, in UTC time.

nested_items.name: AfterContactWorkEndTimestamp
nested_items.description: The date and time when the agent ended After Contact Work for the contact, in UTC time. In cases when agent finishes doing AfterContactWork for chat contacts and switches their activity status to offline or equivalent without clearing the contact in CCP, discrepancies may be noticed for AfterContactWorkEndTimestamp.

nested_items.name: AgentInitiatedHoldDuration
nested_items.description: The total hold duration in seconds initiated by the agent.

nested_items.name: StateTransitions
nested_items.description: List of StateTransition for a supervisor.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the transition.

nested_items.name: StateStartTimestamp
nested_items.description: The date and time when the state started in UTC time.

nested_items.name: StateEndTimestamp
nested_items.description: The date and time when the state ended in UTC time.

nested_items.name: InitiationTimestamp
nested_items.description: The date and time this contact was initiated, in UTC time. For INBOUND, this is when the contact arrived. For OUTBOUND, this is when the agent began dialing. For CALLBACK, this is when the callback contact was created. For TRANSFER and QUEUE_TRANSFER, this is when the transfer was initiated. For API, this is when the request arrived. For EXTERNAL_OUTBOUND, this is when the agent started dialing the external participant. For MONITOR, this is when the supervisor started listening to a contact.

nested_items.name: DisconnectTimestamp
nested_items.description: The date and time that the customer endpoint disconnected from the current contact, in UTC time. In transfer scenarios, the DisconnectTimestamp of the previous contact indicates the date and time when that contact ended.

nested_items.name: LastUpdateTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp when contact was last updated.

nested_items.name: LastPausedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the contact was last paused.

nested_items.name: LastResumedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the contact was last resumed.

nested_items.name: TotalPauseCount
nested_items.description: Total pause count for a contact.

nested_items.name: TotalPauseDurationInSeconds
nested_items.description: Total pause duration for a contact in seconds.

nested_items.name: ScheduledTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp, in Unix epoch time format, at which to start running the inbound flow.

nested_items.name: RelatedContactId
nested_items.description: The contactId that is related to this contact.

nested_items.name: WisdomInfo
nested_items.description: Information about Amazon Connect Wisdom.

nested_items.name: SessionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Wisdom session.

nested_items.name: CustomerId
nested_items.description: The customer's identification number. For example, the CustomerId may be a customer number from your CRM. You can create a Lambda function to pull the unique customer ID of the caller from your CRM system. If you enable Amazon Connect Voice ID capability, this attribute is populated with the CustomerSpeakerId of the caller.

nested_items.name: CustomerEndpoint
nested_items.description: The customer or external third party participant endpoint.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: Type of endpoint.

nested_items.name: Address
nested_items.description: Address of the endpoint.

nested_items.name: DisplayName
nested_items.description: Display name of the endpoint.

nested_items.name: SystemEndpoint
nested_items.description: The system endpoint. For INBOUND, this is the phone number or email address that the customer dialed. For OUTBOUND and EXTERNAL_OUTBOUND, this is the outbound caller ID number assigned to the outbound queue that is used to dial the customer. For callback, this shows up as Softphone for calls handled by agents with softphone.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: Type of endpoint.

nested_items.name: Address
nested_items.description: Address of the endpoint.

nested_items.name: DisplayName
nested_items.description: Display name of the endpoint.

nested_items.name: QueueTimeAdjustmentSeconds
nested_items.description: An integer that represents the queue time adjust to be applied to the contact, in seconds (longer / larger queue time are routed preferentially). Cannot be specified if the QueuePriority is specified. Must be statically defined and a valid integer value.

nested_items.name: QueuePriority
nested_items.description: An integer that represents the queue priority to be applied to the contact (lower priorities are routed preferentially). Cannot be specified if the QueueTimeAdjustmentSeconds is specified. Must be statically defined, must be larger than zero, and a valid integer value. Default Value is 5.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ConnectedToSystemTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp when customer endpoint connected to Amazon Connect.

nested_items.name: RoutingCriteria
nested_items.description: Latest routing criteria on the contact.

nested_items.name: Steps
nested_items.description: List of routing steps. When Amazon Connect does not find an available agent meeting the requirements in a step for a given step duration, the routing criteria will move on to the next step sequentially until a join is completed with an agent. When all steps are exhausted, the contact will be offered to any agent in the queue.

nested_items.name: DurationInSeconds
nested_items.description: The number of seconds to wait before expiring the routing step.

nested_items.name: ExpiryTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp indicating when the routing step expires.

nested_items.name: Expression
nested_items.description: A tagged union to specify expression for a routing step.

nested_items.name: AttributeCondition
nested_items.description: An object to specify the predefined attribute condition.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of predefined attribute.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of predefined attribute.

nested_items.name: ProficiencyLevel
nested_items.description: The proficiency level of the condition.

nested_items.name: MinProficiencyLevel
nested_items.description: The minimum proficiency level of the range.

nested_items.name: MaxProficiencyLevel
nested_items.description: The maximum proficiency level of the range.

nested_items.name: MatchCriteria
nested_items.description: An object to define AgentsCriteria.

nested_items.name: AgentsCriteria
nested_items.description: An object to define agentIds.

nested_items.name: AgentIds
nested_items.description: An object to specify a list of agents, by user ID.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ComparisonOperator
nested_items.description: The operator of the condition.

nested_items.name: AndExpression
nested_items.description: List of routing expressions which will be AND-ed together.

nested_items.name: OrExpression
nested_items.description: List of routing expressions which will be OR-ed together.

nested_items.name: NotAttributeCondition
nested_items.description: An object to specify the predefined attribute condition.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of predefined attribute.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of predefined attribute.

nested_items.name: ProficiencyLevel
nested_items.description: The proficiency level of the condition.

nested_items.name: MinProficiencyLevel
nested_items.description: The minimum proficiency level of the range.

nested_items.name: MaxProficiencyLevel
nested_items.description: The maximum proficiency level of the range.

nested_items.name: MatchCriteria
nested_items.description: An object to define AgentsCriteria.

nested_items.name: AgentsCriteria
nested_items.description: An object to define agentIds.

nested_items.name: AgentIds
nested_items.description: An object to specify a list of agents, by user ID.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ComparisonOperator
nested_items.description: The operator of the condition.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Represents status of the Routing step.

nested_items.name: ActivationTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp indicating when the routing criteria is set to active. A routing criteria is activated when contact is transferred to a queue. ActivationTimestamp will be set on routing criteria for contacts in agent queue even though Routing criteria is never activated for contacts in agent queue.

nested_items.name: Index
nested_items.description: Information about the index of the routing criteria.

nested_items.name: DeviceInfo
nested_items.description: Information regarding Customer's device.

nested_items.name: PlatformName
nested_items.description: Name of the platform that the participant used for the call.

nested_items.name: PlatformVersion
nested_items.description: Version of the platform that the participant used for the call.

nested_items.name: OperatingSystem
nested_items.description: Operating system that the participant used for the call.

nested_items.name: Capabilities
nested_items.description: The configuration for the allowed video and screen sharing capabilities for participants present over the call. For more information, see Set up in-app, web, video calling, and screen sharing capabilities in the Amazon Connect Administrator Guide.

nested_items.name: Video
nested_items.description: The configuration having the video and screen sharing capabilities for participants over the call.

nested_items.name: ScreenShare
nested_items.description: The screen sharing capability that is enabled for the participant. SEND indicates the participant can share their screen.

nested_items.name: CampaignId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for a campaign.

nested_items.name: AnsweringMachineDetectionStatus
nested_items.description: Indicates how an outbound campaign call is actually disposed if the contact is connected to Amazon Connect.

nested_items.name: CustomerVoiceActivity
nested_items.description: Information about customer's voice activity.

nested_items.name: GreetingStartTimestamp
nested_items.description: Timestamp that measures the beginning of the customer greeting from an outbound voice call.

nested_items.name: GreetingEndTimestamp
nested_items.description: Timestamp that measures the end of the customer greeting from an outbound voice call.

nested_items.name: QualityMetrics
nested_items.description: Information about the quality of the participant's media connection.

nested_items.name: QualityScore
nested_items.description: Number measuring the estimated quality of the media connection.

nested_items.name: PotentialQualityIssues
nested_items.description: List of potential issues causing degradation of quality on a media connection. If the service did not detect any potential quality issues the list is empty.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: QualityScore
nested_items.description: Number measuring the estimated quality of the media connection.

nested_items.name: PotentialQualityIssues
nested_items.description: List of potential issues causing degradation of quality on a media connection. If the service did not detect any potential quality issues the list is empty.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: DisconnectDetails
nested_items.description: Information about the call disconnect experience.

nested_items.name: PotentialDisconnectIssue
nested_items.description: Indicates the potential disconnection issues for a call. This field is not populated if the service does not detect potential issues.

nested_items.name: AdditionalEmailRecipients
nested_items.description: List of additional email addresses for an email contact.

nested_items.name: ToList
nested_items.description: List of additional TO email recipients for an email contact.

nested_items.name: Address
nested_items.description: Address of the email recipient.

nested_items.name: DisplayName
nested_items.description: Display name of the email recipient.

nested_items.name: CcList
nested_items.description: List of additional CC email recipients for an email contact.

nested_items.name: Address
nested_items.description: Address of the email recipient.

nested_items.name: DisplayName
nested_items.description: Display name of the email recipient.

nested_items.name: SegmentAttributes
nested_items.description: A set of system defined key-value pairs stored on individual contact segments using an attribute map. The attributes are standard Amazon Connect attributes and can be accessed in flows. Attribute keys can include only alphanumeric, -, and _ characters. This field can be used to show channel subtype. For example, connect:Guide or connect:SMS.

nested_items.name: ValueString
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: ValueString
nested_items.description: The value of a segment attribute.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ValueInteger
nested_items.description: The value of a segment attribute.

nested_items.name: Recordings
nested_items.description: If recording was enabled, this is information about the recordings.

nested_items.name: StorageType
nested_items.description: Where the recording/transcript is stored.

nested_items.name: Location
nested_items.description: The location, in Amazon S3, for the recording/transcript.

nested_items.name: MediaStreamType
nested_items.description: Information about the media stream used during the conversation.

nested_items.name: ParticipantType
nested_items.description: Information about the conversation participant, whether they are an agent or contact. The participant types are as follows:
All.
Manager.
Agent.
Customer.
Thirdparty.
Supervisor.

nested_items.name: FragmentStartNumber
nested_items.description: The number that identifies the Kinesis Video Streams fragment where the customer audio stream started.

nested_items.name: FragmentStopNumber
nested_items.description: The number that identifies the Kinesis Video Streams fragment where the customer audio stream stopped.

nested_items.name: StartTimestamp
nested_items.description: When the conversation of the last leg of the recording started in UTC time.

nested_items.name: StopTimestamp
nested_items.description: When the conversation of the last leg of recording stopped in UTC time.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the recording/transcript.

nested_items.name: DeletionReason
nested_items.description: If the recording/transcript was deleted, this is the reason entered for the deletion.

nested_items.name: DisconnectReason
nested_items.description: The disconnect reason for the contact.

nested_items.name: ContactEvaluations
nested_items.description: Information about the contact evaluations where the key is the FormId, which is a unique identifier for the form.

nested_items.name: FormId
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: FormId
nested_items.description: The FormId of the contact evaluation.

nested_items.name: EvaluationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name for the evaluation form. It is always present.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the evaluation.

nested_items.name: StartTimestamp
nested_items.description: The date and time when the evaluation was started, in UTC time.

nested_items.name: EndTimestamp
nested_items.description: The date and time when the evaluation was submitted, in UTC time.

nested_items.name: DeleteTimestamp
nested_items.description: The date and time when the evaluation was deleted, in UTC time.

nested_items.name: ExportLocation
nested_items.description: The path where evaluation was exported.

nested_items.name: ContactDetails
nested_items.description: A map of string key/value pairs that contain user-defined attributes which are lightly typed within the contact. This object is used only for task contacts.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the contact details.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: Teh description of the contact details.

nested_items.name: Attributes
nested_items.description: The attributes of the contact.
(string) ---
(string) ---
